# Pull Request

Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue. Include relevant motivation and context.

## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test updates

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] No console.log statements left in code

### Functionality
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested responsive design on mobile (if applicable)

### Database
- [ ] Database schema changes have been documented
- [ ] Migration tested successfully
- [ ] No data loss in migration (or documented if intentional)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated `replit.md` with changes
- [ ] I have updated API documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions

### UI/UX (if applicable)
- [ ] Changes follow design guidelines in `design_guidelines.md`
- [ ] UI is responsive and mobile-friendly
- [ ] Accessibility standards followed (WCAG)
- [ ] `data-testid` attributes added to interactive elements
- [ ] Dark mode properly implemented

### Security
- [ ] Input validation implemented with Zod
- [ ] Authentication/authorization properly handled
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed in logs or responses
- [ ] Rate limiting added to sensitive endpoints (if applicable)

### Web3 (if applicable)
- [ ] Smart contract interactions tested on testnet
- [ ] Wallet connection flows tested
- [ ] Transaction error handling implemented
- [ ] Gas optimization considered

## Deployment Notes

Describe any special considerations for deploying this change:

- Database migrations required

## Reviewer Checklist

For reviewers to complete:

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Tests are adequate
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] No security concerns
- [ ] Performance is acceptable
- [ ] Changes are backward compatible (or breaking changes documented)
